result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stone P Robinson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Stone P Robinson not in court, in custody.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court for Stone P Robinson.  Attorney Dennis Patrick Murphy in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Defendant's appearance is waived. Defense requests resolution date. Case remains calendared in Branch 11.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Stone P Robinson not in court, in custody.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court for Stone P Robinson.  Attorney Dennis Patrick Murphy in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a scheduling conference. Parties requested an adjourned status date. Case remains calendared in Branch 11.
Motion on postconviction relief hearing scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Stone P Robinson in court with Attorney Sylvan Jaspen.  Defendant Stone P Robinson in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: West Allis Officer A. Schweitzer. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.    
*Per Chief Judge Directive 22-04 effective July 30, 2022, this calendar will be assigned to Judge David Swanson, Branch 11 in Room 608 Courthouse.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Stone P Robinson not in court, defendant in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. The defendant was not available by video for todays proceedings.   Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Stone P Robinson not in court, defendant in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing at 8:30am. Case called at 4:55pm. Parties were present; due to Court congestion Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court by video, defendant Stone P Robinson not in court, in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Mr Robinson is housed at Dodge; his appearance is waived. Dodge is unable to connect by video. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Stone P Robinson not in court, defendant in custody.  John Daniel Flynn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  No driving without a valid license.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

9:20AM Defendant Stone P Robinson in court with attorney Travis Schwantes.  Defendant Stone P Robinson in custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Stone P Robinson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Sanders, Branch 28. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
